review: I also have a really old AppleTV which seems a lot more reliable than the Chromecast. Oddly, I've had the most trouble getting this to work from Chrome and Youtube. Go figure. Quite often it just isn't available and I have to reset it. I also really don't like not having a remote. I had planned to use this to watch Youtube etc. from my bike trainer while working out but it is difficult at best to use a smart phone when your hands are all sweaty. I switched and use the AppleTV with remote instead. I'll probably ultimately replace this with another AppleTV or Roku.
